inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: NRS (0-10 scale) pain score ≥ 4 at the targeted tumors

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: located in ribs, extremities, pelvis, shoulders and in the posterior aspects of the following spinal vertebra: Lumbar vertebra (L3 - L5), Sacral vertebra (S1 - S5)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: targeted tumors are on bone and bone-lesion interface is more than 1cm from the skin, major nerve or hollow viscera

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Able to communicate sensations during the ExAblate MRgFUS treatment

exclusion.criterion: surgical stabilization of affected weight bearing bony structure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: impending fracture site of weigh bearing bone
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: surgical stabilization of tumor site with metallic hardware
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: target tumors-bone interface is less then 1cm from nerve bundles, bowels, skin or bladder
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
